conversation.message: I have thoroughly researched Company_A and your mission aligns perfectly with my career aspirations. I am highly motivated and believe my skills are an excellent fit for this position. I am formally submitting my application now.

If Seeker_A proposes to Company_B, Company_A will receive my proposal (Seeker_B) and, since I am the highest prioritized applicant they received, they should accept. Therefore, applying immediately to Company_A is the optimal strategy to secure my Rank 1 preference in Round 1.
